user_query: I want to analyze the nutritional value of a specific ingredient and calculate the CO2e in Kg generated by consuming 500 KWH of traditional hydro energy in Europe.

TaskList.description: Analyze the nutritional value of the specified ingredient by querying a database or API that provides nutritional information.
Calculate the CO2e emissions generated by consuming 500 KWH of traditional hydro energy by querying an environmental data service or database.
